mapper.insert: insert into recipe_comment(recipe_id , mf_no , comment_content , parentCommentNo) values(#{recipe_id},#{mf_no},#{comment_content},#{parentCommentNo})
mapper.select: SELECT rc.comment_no , rc.recipe_id , rc.mf_no , rc.comment_content , rc.parentCommentNo , rc.deleted , rc.created_at , rc.recommend_count , u.mf_nickname , ui.profile_image_path AS profile_image_path FROM recipe_comment rc LEFT JOIN user_image ui ON rc.mf_no = ui.mf_no JOIN matflix u ON rc.mf_no = u.mf_no WHERE rc.recipe_id = #{recipe_id} AND rc.deleted = 0 ORDER BY rc.comment_no ASC
mapper.update: update recipe_comment set deleted = 1 where comment_no=#{comment_no}
update recipe_comment set recommend_count = recommend_count + 1 where comment_no=#{comment_no}
update recipe_comment set recommend_count = recommend_count - 1 where comment_no=#{comment_no}
